recipe.title: Apple Crumble
recipe.subtitle: Maked 4-6 Portions
recipe.ingredients: ----Filling---- 1 kg cooping apples, peeled, thinly sliced 1/2 C sultanas 1/2 C brown sugar 1/4 tsp ground cinnamon ----Topping---- 1 1/2 C self raising flour pinch of salt 80g Butter 1/2 brown sugar 1 1/2 tsp mixed spices
recipe.steps: Mix the apples, sultanas, brown sugar, spices and lemon juice. Place mixture in a buttered baking dish Sieve flour and salt together. Rub the butter into the flour until the mixture resembles crumbs. Mix in the sugar and spice. Sprinkle the topping over the apples. Bake at 180C for approx 1 hour until fruit is soft and the top is coloured. Serve with custard or cream.
